title: BBC Worlds Weirdest Events Series 1 6of8 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGr
description:
Worlds Weirdest Events: Series 1

Nature Documentary hosted by Chris Packham, published by BBC in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/1/1f/Worlds-Weirdest-Events-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Worlds Weirdest Events
Weird is right. Can you imagine goats injected with a spider gene so they produce silk in their milk? How about a macaque giving another monkey CPR after it was electrocuted on an Indian railway? Birds that were mysteriously burnt alive mid-flight? 
Chris Packham (looking very Reservoir Dogs in his shades and suit as he strides around the desert) links footage of some truly bizarre events, which may turn your stomach as well as make your jaw drop. The pulsating crimson blob discovered in a sewer is revolting, whereas siphonophores (no, I hadn't heard of them either) look like exquisite glass sculptures even though the way they grow is odd.


1)  Part 1 
From the team who brought you Nature's Weirdest Events comes a new series exploring the unexplained, the unexpected and the unidentifiable. Chris Packham unlocks the secrets behind the world's weirdest events from a bird-killing solar death ray to a monkey that's learnt first aid.

2)  Part 2 
From his base in an abandoned town in the Nevada desert, Chris Packham explores fascinatingly bizarre stories from around the world. In this episode, Chris uncovers the secret of suspiciously fishy oil slick, what's making a lemming very angry, and how a man can see with his ears.

3)  Part 3 
Exploring everything from animal oddities to crazy weather, medical marvels and remarkable natural phenomena, Chris Packham uncovers the world's weirdest events - from a man who gets drunk without touching a drop of alcohol to some chart-topping molecular music.

4)  Part 4 
Chris Packham continues his adventure through our weird world, discovering the secrets behind some of its strangest stories. In this episode, Chris unearths a whirlwind wedding ceremony, some exploding rocks, and a woman with her twin inside her brain.

5)  Part 5 
Our weird world throws up more surprises for Chris Packham. In this episode, Chris reveals how deadly poisonous frogs can saves lives, why we see faces in everything and how one woman's pants spontaneously burst into flame.

6)  Part 6 
The world has gone weird for Chris Packham. In this episode, Chris explores the mysteries behind a glacier that bleeds red, finds out how an electrician got tattooed by a lightning bolt and uncovers the remarkable story of a man with a tooth for an eye.

7)  Part 7 
Chris Packham uncovers the weirdest events our world has to offer. In this episode, Chris discovers the secrets behind a flame-filled firenado, unearths a very odd-looking living rock, and meets a team of oversized rats who save lives by sniffing out landmines.

8)  Part 8 
Episode 8 information will appear here soon
